Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manager()
      Manager constructor initializes array list of Tickets and Flights

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bookSeat(int flightNumber, Passenger p)
      method to book a seat if the flight number exists and the flight is not full books a seat and adds a ticket object to the instance variable ticket array list else prints the flight is booked
      void createFlights()
      Method to create Flights which can be purchased by Members or NonMembers fills array of Flights with created flights
      void displayFlights(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination)
      Method to display flights if flight does not exist, prints 'no available flights' else prints out all available flights with space
      Flight getFlight(int flightNumber)
      getter method for flight searches array of flights for desired flight
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method to prove functionality of this class as well as, Passenger, Member, NonMember, Ticket, and Flight

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Manager

        public Manager()
        Manager constructor initializes array list of Tickets and Flights

    • Method Detail

      • createFlights

        public void createFlights()
        Method to create Flights which can be purchased by Members or NonMembers fills array of Flights with created flights

      • displayFlights

        public void displayFlights(java.lang.String origin,
                           java.lang.String destination)
        Method to display flights if flight does not exist, prints 'no available flights' else prints out all available flights with space
        Parameters:
        origin - Origin of the flight you want
        destination - Destination of the flight you want

      • getFlight

        public Flight getFlight(int flightNumber)
        getter method for flight searches array of flights for desired flight
        Parameters:
        flightNumber - flight number of the flight you want
        Returns:
        flight if found, otherwise returns null

      • bookSeat

        public void bookSeat(int flightNumber,
                     Passenger p)
        method to book a seat if the flight number exists and the flight is not full books a seat and adds a ticket object to the instance variable ticket array list else prints the flight is booked
        Parameters:
        flightNumber - flight number for desired flight to be booked
        p - Passenger object (polymorphic for type Member and NonMember) for who the ticket is being booked for

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to prove functionality of this class as well as, Passenger, Member, NonMember, Ticket, and Flight
